text: Trường Chinh (; 9 February 1907, Xuân Trường District, Nam Định Province – 30 September 1988, Hanoi) was a Vietnamese communist political leader and theoretician. He was one of the key figures of Vietnamese politics.Stein Tonesson, Vietnam 1946: How did the War Began (Berkeley: University of California Press, 2010), p. 20. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Presidents of Vietnam Category:General Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam
title: Trường Chinh
